description: Returns information about a core network change event.

parameters.name: CoreNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of a core network.

parameters.name: PolicyVersionId
parameters.description: The ID of the policy version.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Describes the type of change event.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: The action taken for the change event.

nested_items.name: IdentifierPath
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies the path for a change within the changeset. For example, the IdentifierPath for a core network segment change might be "CORE_NETWORK_SEGMENT/us-east-1/devsegment".

nested_items.name: EventTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for an event change in status.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the core network change event.

nested_items.name: EdgeLocation
nested_items.description: The edge location for the core network change event.

nested_items.name: SegmentName
nested_items.description: The segment name if the change event is associated with a segment.

nested_items.name: NetworkFunctionGroupName
nested_items.description: The changed network function group name.

nested_items.name: AttachmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the attachment if the change event is associated with an attachment.

nested_items.name: Cidr
nested_items.description: For a STATIC_ROUTE event, this is the IP address.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next page of results.
